entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McCreary
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
